title: Home Page Loads Correctly with CMS Data
description: Verify the Home page renders the hero section, cafe info, special offers, testimonials, and gallery preview using server-side fetched CMS data or fallback content if CMS is unavailable.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home page URL
Verify hero section is visible with correct content from CMS or fallback
Check cafe information displayed matches CMS or fallback data
Confirm special offers section is present with accurate data
Ensure testimonials are shown correctly
Verify gallery preview thumbnails are displayed

title: Responsive Navigation Bar Works on Desktop and Mobile
description: Validate navigation bar displays links, highlights the active page, toggles mobile menu correctly, and animates smoothly on different screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop viewport
Check navigation links display horizontally with active page highlighted
Resize viewport to mobile size
Verify hamburger menu icon is visible
Click hamburger menu icon
Ensure mobile menu expands with navigation links
Click a navigation link
Confirm menu closes and page navigates; active link reflects current page

title: Menu Page Displays Categorized Items Accurately
description: Verify the Menu page loads menu items grouped by categories with correct pricing, descriptions, dietary information, and special offers consistent with CMS data.

steps.description: Navigate to the Menu page
Check that menu categories are displayed
For each category, verify menu items are listed with name, price, description, and dietary info
Confirm any special offers are indicated on relevant items
Resize screen to mobile and ensure responsive layout adapts

title: Gallery Page Filters and Displays Media Correctly
description: Test the Gallery page showcases images and videos in a responsive masonry grid, supports filtering by category, hover effects, and video playback functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to Gallery page
Ensure gallery displays a masonry grid with images and videos
Use the category filters to select a category
Verify gallery updates to show only items matching the selected category
Hover over gallery items
Check that hover effects appear as expected on the items
Play a video item in the gallery
Verify video plays correctly and controls respond
Resize viewport to check responsive adjustments

title: Blog System Loads Posts Correctly and Handles Missing Posts
description: Validate that the blog listing loads dynamically from CMS with SEO metadata and individual blog posts render properly. The system should gracefully handle missing or non-existent posts with a 404 page.

steps.description: Navigate to the Blog listing page
Confirm blog posts are listed with titles, previews, and metadata
Select and navigate to an individual blog post
Ensure full post content is displayed with rich text formatting
Verify SEO meta tags and structured data are present on the post page
Manually navigate to a non-existent blog post URL
Check custom 404 page appears with navigation options back to Home and Menu

title: Contact Page Displays Info and Form Responsively
description: Check that the Contact page shows accurate contact information and includes a fully responsive contact inquiry form with proper field labels and layout adaptations across devices.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact page
Verify contact information (address, phone, email) is displayed correctly
Check the presence of a contact form with all required fields
Confirm form fields have proper labels and accessibility attributes
Resize viewport to mobile and verify form layout adjusts appropriately

title: Floating Action Button Functions Correctly
description: Verify that the Floating Action Button expands and collapses smoothly with animations and that each quick action (order, call, directions) triggers the intended behavior.

steps.description: Locate the Floating Action Button on any page
Confirm initial FAB state is collapsed and visible
Click the FAB to expand
Verify quick action buttons appear with smooth animation
Click the order quick action
Ensure order action triggers the expected behavior or navigation
Click the call quick action
Confirm the call action initiates a phone call or displays the phone number
Click the directions quick action
Validate directions action opens the map application or shows directions
Click the FAB again to collapse
Check that FAB returns to collapsed state with proper animation

title: Loading Spinner Displays Appropriately During Async Operations
description: Ensure the Loading Spinner component appears during asynchronous data fetching or loading processes with correct size variations and optional custom text.

steps.description: Trigger a page or component data load that uses the Loading Spinner
Verify the spinner is visible during the loading state
Check spinner size matches requested size (small, medium, large)
Confirm optional custom loading text is displayed if provided
After data load finishes, ensure spinner disappears

title: Dark/Light Theme Toggle with Persistence and Accessibility
description: Validate the theme toggle detects system preference initially, toggles between dark and light modes, persists user choice across sessions, and includes accessibility enhancements.

steps.description: Load the app with system preference set to dark mode
Verify initial theme is dark
Use the theme toggle button to switch to light mode
Confirm theme changes to light and updates UI styles
Refresh page
Check that previously selected theme persists
Verify the toggle button has ARIA labels and keyboard focusable
Confirm toggle can be activated using keyboard only

title: SEO Meta Tags and Structured Data Present on Key Pages
description: Confirm essential SEO elements like meta tags, Open Graph tags, and structured data are correctly included in the HTML of Home, Menu, Blog post, and Contact pages.

steps.description: Navigate to Home page
Inspect page source and verify presence of meta description, keywords, Open Graph tags, and JSON-LD structured data
Navigate to Menu page
Verify meta tags and structured data are present and valid
View a Blog post page
Confirm SEO metadata specific to the blog post is included
Navigate to Contact page
Check required SEO and social meta tags present

title: Error Boundaries and Custom 404 Page Function Correctly
description: Test that the application gracefully handles unexpected errors with error boundaries and displays a custom 404 page for unavailable routes, including navigation back to Home and Menu pages.

steps.description: Navigate to a completely non-existent route
Confirm custom 404 page is shown with readable message
Verify navigation links back to Home and Menu are present and functional
Simulate an unexpected runtime error within a component
Verify the error boundary catches the error and displays a fallback UI

title: Accessibility Compliance Across Major Components
description: Ensure all pages and interactive components comply with accessibility standards including keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, focus management, and color contrast requirements.

steps.description: Use keyboard tab navigation across all major pages and components
Confirm all interactive elements are reachable and actionable via keyboard
Verify ARIA labels and roles are present and correct on all navigation and interactive elements
Use color contrast tool to check all text and UI elements meet WCAG contrast requirements

title: Performance Metrics Meet Target Core Web Vitals
description: Measure and validate that the application performance meets specified Core Web Vitals thresholds (LCP < 2.5s, FID < 100ms, CLS < 0.1) on representative pages including Home, Menu, and Blog.

steps.description: Load the Home page under normal network conditions
Measure and assert LCP is less than 2.5 seconds
Measure FID and ensure it is below 100 milliseconds
Verify CLS is below 0.1 during page load and interactions
Repeat measurements on Menu and Blog pages
